name: real-time-vehicle-pricing-system
description: Full-stack vehicle pricing application with real-time features.

scripts.client-install: echo "Frontend dependencies (react, react-dom, lucide-react) are listed. For a standalone React project structure, manage these within its own package.json or build process."
scripts.client: echo "To run a dedicated React development server (for features like Hot Module Replacement), you would typically use a tool like Create React App or Vite, which provides its own 'start' script. In the current integrated setup, the backend server (Express) can be configured to serve the built static assets of the React application."
